original_title: Los Aguiluchos de la FAI por tierras de Aragón Reportaje nº 1: Estampas de la revolución antifascista
overview: This documentary is the first of a series that dedicated 4 issues to the activity of the Durruti column in Aragon.
title: The Aguiluchos of the FAI in the Land of Aragón Report 1: Stamps of the antifascist revolution
